entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is fiercely loyal to Harry Potter. He is described as 'tiny' and 'shaking', indicating his fear of Bellatrix.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is a Death Eater who is trying to kill Harry Potter. She is described as shrieking and bawling at Dobby.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the story. He is being attacked by Bellatrix and her cohorts.

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is a witch who has her wand taken away by Dobby. She is described as shrieking along with Bellatrix.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who is being rescued by Harry Potter from under the chandelier.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story. He is described as being about to arrive with his Death Eaters.

relationships.description: Dobby has come to save Harry Potter and his friends, indicating that he is protecting them.
Bellatrix is trying to kill Dobby, indicating that she is attacking him.
Narcissa's wand is taken away by Dobby, indicating that he is attacking her.
Harry Potter is rescuing Griphook from under the chandelier.
